programme.title: Acima da Lei, (2019, Action)

programme.title: Fbrica de Animais, (2000, Crime)
programme.desc: Condenado por trfico, o jovem Ron tenta no chamar muito a ateno, mas logo notado por outros presos. Para no ser violentado, faz amizade com o lder de uma gangue e comea a receber proteo e benefcios. At que chega o dia de pagar a dvida.

programme.title: Pitbull: Fora Bruta, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Na Europa Oriental, um jovem convive com a pobreza e a violncia das ruas, at que se junta ao submundo do crime, tornandose pea importante no esquema da mfia. Um policial segue no encalo dele e no vai parar at derrubar toda a rede.

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingana Explosiva, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Ruslan Drachev um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experincias. Ao visitar sua famlia ele descobre que sua filha est casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime.

programme.title: Acima da Lei, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial se infiltrou em uma rede de distribuio de herona e se envolve profundamente quando um jovem desertor de drogas deixa sua irm de cinco anos sob seus cuidados.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra!
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo
programme.desc: Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimenso. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A batalha final do torneio comea com Boruto, Sarada e Shinki participando de uma disputa no estilo mata-mata.
programme.sub-title: O Usurio da Aldeia de Ferro: Shinki

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Momoshiki, Kinshiki e Urashiki, todos do Cl Otsutsuki, aparecem de repente na arena lotada de espectadores, e Boruto v de perto a extenso do poder de combate do pai.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto percebe o tamanho do amor de seu pai pela aldeia e as pessoas, o que tambm acaba sendo sua fraqueza.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sasuke e os Kages travam uma batalha intensa contra Momoshiki e Kinshiki do Cl Otsutsuki que so ridiculamente poderosos.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Com Boruto assistindo tudo atentamente, Naruto e Sasuke iniciam uma batalha contra o poderoso Momoshiki!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto j pediu desculpas a todos pelos erros cometidos durante a prova, mas continua preocupado com a profecia de Momoshiki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Os famosos atores Tomaru e Ashina recebem ameaas de morte de uma pessoa desconhecida. Agora cabe s Equipes 7 e 10 os protegerem em uma misso em conjunto.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O flerte de Tomaru deixa Cho-Cho nas nuvens, o que faz Sarada e os outros se perguntarem se a apaixonada Cho-Cho no perdeu o foco na misso!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O ninja com mscara de gs aparece novamente durante as filmagens e sequestra Tomaru.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Rock Lee, pai de Metal, anuncia que ele ensinar a Metal a tcnica suprema de taijutsu, Os Oito Portais Internos.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Aps o ataque do Cl Otsutsuki, o Encontro dos Cinco Kages acontece na Aldeia da Folha. Os Kages atuais e seus predecessores se renem, exceto por Ohnoki, o Terceiro Tsuchikage.
programme.sub-title: A pedra mais dura do mundo

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Os ninjas encarregados de guardar o Porto da Aldeia da Folha so atacados, e Mitsuki desaparece.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A aldeia descobre que Boruto e Sarada saram em busca de Mitsuki. Ento a Equipe 10, de Shikadai, recebe a misso de rastre-los e traz-los de volta.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Orochimaru fala para Boruto e Sakura sobre o Sbio da Cobra Branca que vive na Caverna Ryuchi. No caminho, os dois so confrontados pela Equipe 10.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e seus amigos descobrem que, para se encontrar com o Sbio da Cobra Branca, precisaro passar por uma srie de testes.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O Sbio da Cobra Branca pede que Boruto traga para ele uma "Escama Invertida" de Garaga, uma cobra problemtica.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e companhia trabalham juntos para conseguir a Escama Invertida de Garaga, mas a batalha se mostra difcil, uma vez que Garaga tem o poder de sentir a localizao dos inimigos e transform-los em pedra.
programme.sub-title: Um inimigo feroz: O ataque cruel de Garaga!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mitsuki vai para a terra natal de Kokuyou e Sekiei, o Pas da Terra.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e seus amigos conseguem superar Kokuyou e finalmente alcanam Mitsuki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Em vez de voltar para casa com Boruto, Mitsuki fica com Kokuyou.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto est ferido, inconsciente e no pode mais continuar. Todos pensam em voltar para a Aldeia da Folha.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Determinados a encontrar Ohnoki, a equipe se infiltra na aldeia sem saber que est sendo observada.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A equipe encontra Ohnoki, mas ele se recusa a ajudar. Para piorar a situao, eles so atacados e acabam se separando.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: No meio do caminho para o ponto de encontro, Boruto e Ohnoki se deparam com o Campo de Treinamento da Aldeia da Pedra.
programme.sub-title: Os pensamentos de Ohnoki e de Kou

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Para conseguir sair da barreira, Boruto busca desesperadamente pelo corao de pedra, mas no o encontra.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Ohnoki leva Boruto a um lugar especial para explicar sua opinio sobre do futuro, opinio essa formada aps a perda de Kozuchi, seu neto.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Kakou usa um Estilo Partcula raro e poderoso, levando Boruto ao limite.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e Sarada so pegos e levados de volta para a base da Aldeia da Pedra junto com Ohnoki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Kirara aparece e transforma Boruto e Sarada em "fantoches". Em seguida, ela ordena que os dois se matem.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Surpreso e confuso com as aes de Mitsuki, Sekiei o ataca de forma imprudente.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Ku aparece novamente para provocar e atacar Boruto.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e os outros genins voltam para a Aldeia da Folha com Mitsuki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e sua irm Himawari esperam ansiosamente pelo Dia de Pais e Filhos.

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Colina dos Homens Maus, (1969, Western)

programme.title: Por uns Dlares a Mais, (1965, Western)

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingana do drago, (2016, Action)

programme.title: Punhos da Vingana, (2021, Action)

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capito da polcia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man perseguido por um gngster vingativo, enquanto o exrcito japons invade a regio.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)

programme.title: The 39 Steps, (1935, Thriller)
programme.desc: A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage Agent. But when the Agent is killed, and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring which is trying to steal top secret information.

programme.title: The Lady Vanishes, (1938, Thriller)
programme.desc: While travelling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief, (1955, Thriller)

programme.title: Indiscreet, (1958, Comedy)

programme.title: Houseboat, (1958, Comedy)

programme.title: The Mechanic, (2011, Action)

programme.title: Species III, (2004, Science fiction)

programme.title: Day of the Dead, (1985, Horror)

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series
programme.desc: In a ghost colony where no one is supposed to live, Tetsuro and the gang meet Dr. Cicropros and a legion of his clones.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series

programme.desc: The 999 is in really bad shape on the Planet of the Cowardly Elder! And it's the doing of the cowardly president of the planet who trusts no one, Delmukade.
programme.sub-title: The Empire of the Cowardly Elder

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series
programme.desc: The suitcase with Tetsuro and Maetel's passes is stolen. However, the thief collapses while making their escape.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series

programme.desc: Within the Chief's castle Tetsuro learns of some sort of secret and sees Maetel being subservient to the Chief.
programme.sub-title: The Chief of the Spherical Housing Complex Part Two

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series
programme.desc: As they approach the station, the Face of Memories, a woman passenger named Female causes a disturbance on the train and derails the 999.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series
programme.desc: Tetsuro has his pass stolen on a planet where the wind never stops blowing. Tetsuro believes the thief to be a young man named Kira but Kira denies any wrongdoing.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series
programme.desc: At Deadwood Mountain, a young man named Prider arrived on a train in order to make money for his girlfriend Alice by music.
programme.sub-title: Space Ride of the Valkyries Part One

programme.desc: Tetsuro, haven been taken aboard the Valkyrie's mothership, tries to escape. Prider tries to defend Tetsuro and is stabbed by the Valkyries.
programme.sub-title: Space Ride of the Valkyries Part Two

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series
programme.desc: Maetel, Nanmi, and Tetsuro go down to an ancient battlefield. Fully automated tanks which activate when they detect the presence of life have been left behind there

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series
programme.desc: On a planet where war is considered a tourist attraction, the 999 stops and the passengers eat dinner while watching people actually in battle.
programme.sub-title: The Laboratory of Eternal War Part One

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series
programme.desc: Zeda is convinced to join a rebel militia by a female soldier named Santana and they set off to not fight as a tourist attraction, but to do battle with the leader of the planet.
programme.sub-title: The Laboratory of Eternal War Part Two

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series
programme.desc: Tetsuro and the gang go to a planet full of industrious people. A planet that, although poor, is brimming with vigor.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series
programme.desc: A woman named Eroze who controls the tunnels that don't absorb any sound tries to destroy the 999. In order to save the 999 from destruction, Tetsuro goes with the woman.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series
programme.desc: An oddly shaped planet complete with giant life-forms appears in the 999's path. Though they have the desire, the planet lacks the desire to move and the 999, unable to escape, sinks into the planet.
programme.sub-title: Artemis of the Transparent Sea Part One

programme.desc: The transparent woman is named Artemis. She lives on the oddly shaped planet but left to get a mechanical body and now she wishes to reside on the planet.
programme.sub-title: Artemis of the Transparent Sea Part Two

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series
programme.desc: Maetel, mistakenly brings Manabu Sunayama, a boy with a pass for the 999 who looks identical to Tetsuro, back to the hotel.

programme.sub-title: The Cold Blooded Empire Part One

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series
programme.desc: Tiny, learning of Tetsuro's trouble from his girlfriend Rayde, asks her to give a message to him. Rayde rescues Tetsuro in Tiny's place and forwards the message.
programme.sub-title: The Cold Blooded Empire Part Two

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series
programme.desc: On a planet rumored to have ghosts, Tetsuro encounters a ghost made of water.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series
programme.desc: The Lazy Man's Mirror is a planet where everything has been made to be automatic and men have nothing to do. They've gotten obese enough to literally make their houses explode.

programme.desc: They arrive on the Future Planet, a planet where the existence of the 999 is kept secret.
programme.sub-title: Planet of a Pint Size Room Part One

programme.desc: Without even food to eat, Tetsuro begins to work. But, they won't reissue his pass so unless he gets it back he will be unable to board the 999.
programme.sub-title: Planet of a Pint Size Room Part Two

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series
programme.desc: Under the Perfect Sleep law, you are not allowed to go out at night on the planet Town without Night.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999 Series

programme.sub-title: Symphonic Poem and the Witch's Harp

programme.desc: After the Civil War, Texas is at the mercy of murderous bandits. A group of unlikely heroes emerges to battle these renegade outlaws. Out-manned, they summon the courage to protect the innocent put the wrong things right in their beloved homeland.

programme.title: Beowulf, (2007, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After Beowulf, the mightiest warrior of all, destroyes the overpowering demon Grendel, he incurs wrath of the beast's mother to seek out revenge.

programme.title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow, (2004, Adventure)
programme.desc: When mysterious giant robots begin attacking the streets of New York City, intrepid reporter Polly Perkins is on the story and enlists the aid of ace aviator and old flame Joseph 'Sky Captain' Sullivan.

programme.title: Super 8, (2011, Adventure)
programme.desc: In the summer of 1979, a group of friends in a small Ohio town witness a catastrophic train crash while making a Super 8 movie and soon suspect that it was not an accident.

programme.title: Coraline, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Coraline Jones discovers a secret world that's like her own, but better! When her Other Mother tries to keep her, Coraline must be brave to get home.

programme.title: ParaNorman, (2012, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Norman Babcock finds his paranormal abilities pushed to their limits to take on zombies and ghosts, and save his town from a centuries-old curse.

programme.title: The Boxtrolls, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When evil Archibald Snatcher decides to capture the Boxtrolls lovable, box-wearing creatures its up to Eggs and his friend Winnie to same them.

programme.title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow, (2004, Adventure)

programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: Downsizing, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: When scientists find a way to shrink humans to five inches tall, Paul and his wife decide to get small and live large in a luxurious downsized community. With endless possibilities in the tiny world, Paul realizes we are meant for something bigger.

programme.title: Chicago, (2002, Musical)
programme.desc: Winner of 6 Academy Awards, including Best Picture, and based on the hit Broadway musical, Chicago is a dazzling spectacle cheered by audiences and critics alike, where crimes of passion make way for legends to those seeking the spotlight.

programme.title: Almost Famous, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies it on their concert tour.

programme.title: Shakespeare In Love, (1998, Romance)
programme.desc: After providing inspiration to Will Shakespeare, his case of writer's block cured, and a taste for romance rekindled by the mysterious Lady Viola. Gwyneth Paltrow, Joseph Fiennes, Ben Affleck, and Dame Judi Dench star in this Best Picture winner.

programme.title: The Artist, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: Hollywood 1927. George Valentin is a very successful silent movie star, but the arrival of talking pictures could mark the end of his career.

programme.title: Masters Of The Universe, (1987, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The fantastic exploits of He-Man and his arch rival, the evil Skeletor, are brought to the big screen for the first time in this live-action adventure.

programme.title: Earth Girls Are Easy, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Three aliens (Jim Carrey, Damon Wayans, and Jeff Goldblum) crash-land in Los Angeles' San Fernando Valley. A manicurist (Geena Davis) and her boss (the wacky Julie Brown) befriend the threesome, give them makeovers and show them the town.

programme.title: Popeye, (1980, Comedy)
programme.desc: The legendary, beloved anvil-armed sailor of the seven seas comes magically to life in this delightful musical, starring Robin Williams as Popeye, who meets all challenges with the unshakable philosophy, "I yam what I yam and that's all that I yam."

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Science fiction)
programme.desc: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

programme.title: Earth Girls Are Easy, (1988, Comedy)

programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: Species II, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A trio of American astronauts become instant heroes as they plant the Stars and Stripes on Mars before beginning the voyage home. But back on their ship, something else has set its sights on Earth, something whose relatives have already paid us a visit.

programme.title: Gretel & Hansel, (2020, Horror)

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood and Honey, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey follows Pooh and Piglet as they go on a rampage after Christopher Robin abandons them.

programme.title: Pet Sematary, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the terrifying novel by Stephen King... After the Creed family moves to rural Maine, they stumble upon an ancient burial ground with sinister powers. When tragedy strikes, a perilous chain of events unleashes an unfathomable evil.

programme.title: Mom And Dad, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: A teenage girl and her little brother must survive a wild 24 hours during which a mass hysteria of unknown origins causes parents to turn violently on their own kids.

programme.title: Hell House LLC., (2016, Horror)
programme.desc: Five years after an unexplained malfunction causes the death of 15 tour-goers and staff on the opening night of a Halloween haunted house tour, a documentary crew travels back to the scene of the tragedy to find out what really happened.

programme.title: V/H/S, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: This is a point-of-view, found-footage horror film from the America's top genre filmmakers. A group of misfits are hired to burglarize a house and acquire a rare tape. They are confronted with a dead body, old televisions and a supply of cryptic footage.

programme.title: V/H/S/2, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: From the innovative minds that brought you last year's V/H/S comes V/H/S/2, an all-new anthology of dread, madness, and gore.

programme.title: V/H/S: Viral, (2015, Horror)
programme.desc: A deranged truck driver has received the audience of many teens. These teens video with cameras and cell phones to catch the next viral video. However, they are the stars of the next big viral video - one where they face their own horrifying deaths.

programme.title: Vampire's Kiss, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Teetering on the edge of sanity, volatile literary agent Peter Loew (Nicolas Cage) tries to find purpose in his life through a cutthroat work ethic and a hedonistic nightlife.

programme.title: We're No Angels, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: There's something funny about those two new priests. In fact, there's something downright hilarious. Because Robert De Niro and Sean Penn aren't clergymen at all.

programme.title: The Heavenly Kid, (1985, Comedy)
programme.desc: Thou Shalt Be Cool with this totally awesome 80s classic when a helpless nerd (Jason Gedrick) gets divine intervention from a hip guardian angel (Lewis Smith) straight from the 1960s! Jane Kaczmarek, Nancy Valen and Richard Mulligan also star.

programme.title: The Yards, (2000, Crime)
programme.desc: After being released from prison, Leo Handler (Mark Wahlberg) takes a job with his powerfully influential Uncle Frank (James Caan). Leo soon finds himself unwittingly drawn into a world of sabotage, high-stakes payoffs, and even murder.

programme.title: Marlowe, (2023, Crime)
programme.desc: Marlowe, a gripping thriller set in 1939 LA. Hard-boiled private eye, Philip Marlowe, is hired to find the lover of a glamorous heiress. Unexpectedly, Marlowe finds himself embroiled in a deadly mystery that he's determined to either solve or die trying.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: A Simple Plan, (1998, Crime)
programme.desc: In a gym bag. That's how three men size up what they've found in the snowy Minnesota woods. They've come across a downed plane with a rotting corpse inside...and over $4 million stuffed inside a duffel bag. Finders, keepers? Maybe.

programme.title: The Yards, (2000, Crime)
programme.desc: After being released from prison, Leo Handler (Mark Wahlberg) takes a job with his powerfully influential Uncle Frank (James Caan). Leo soon finds himself unwittingly drawn into a world of sabotage, high-stakes payoffs, and even murder.

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a massive heist against the U.S. Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its Mint facilities.

programme.title: Killing Them Softly, (2012, Crime)
programme.desc: During the economic turmoil of 2008, Jackie Cogan (Brad Pitt), an enforcer, is hired to restore order after three idiots rob a mob-protected poker game.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: Apocalypse Now: Redux, (2001, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: This is the definitive version of Francis Ford Coppola's stunning vision of the heart of darkness in all of us, re-edited and remastered with 49 minutes of additional footage.

programme.title: Barbarella, (1968, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The setting is the planet Lythion in the year 40,000, when Barbarella makes a forced landing while traveling through space. She vanquishes evil in the forms of robots and monsters. She also rewards the handsome men who assist her in the adventure.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Dance & Party)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: Raging Bull, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: RAGING BULL is director Martin Scorsese's lacerating film biography of middleweight boxing champion Jake LaMotta, who was known during his brief reign as "the Bronx Bull."

programme.title: Black Sunday, (1977, Thriller)
programme.desc: Black Sunday is the powerful story of a Black September terrorist group attempting to blow up a Goodyear blimp hovering over the Super Bowl stadium with 80,000 people and the President of the United States in attendance.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gruesome scene adorns a pier in San Pedro, south of Los Angeles. Twenty-seven dead bodies. A burned-out ship smoldering in the harbor.

programme.title: Ronin, (1998, Adventure)
programme.desc: When an international team of former Cold War intelligence adversaries meet in a Warehouse, their venture of friendship, intrigue and betrayal has just begun.

programme.title: Get Shorty, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Golden Globe winner John Travolta stars with Gene Hackman, Danny DeVito and Rene Russo in this wildly popular comedy of a gangster who turns into a big-time producer after he travels to Hollywood to collect a debt from a down-and-out filmmaker.

programme.title: Higher Learning, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: Kristy Swanson, Omar Epps and Michael Rapaport star as first-term freshmen who get a crash course in diversity, identity and sexuality in writer/director John Singleton's bold look at contemporary college life.

programme.title: The Quick and the Dead, (1995, Western)
programme.desc: In this edgy and darkly humorous Western, a mysterious young woman rides into the lawless town of Redemption to settle an old score that has haunted her since she was a child. She becomes swept up in a deadly quick-draw tournament. Rated: R

programme.title: Thunderheart, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: Single White Female, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: SWF seeks female to share apt in West 70s. Non-smoker, professional preferred. An innocent want ad opens the door to murderous, unrelenting terror in this pulse-pounding psychological shocker starring Bridget Fonda and Jennifer Jason Leigh. Rated: R

programme.title: First Knight, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: Together, Sean Connery, Richard Gere, Julia Ormond (Legends of the Fall, Sabrina) and Jerry Zucker, the director of Ghost, bring you a new vision of King Arthur's Camelot.

programme.title: The Man in the Iron Mask, (1998, Adventure)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio leads a phenomenal cast in this thrilling tale of majesty and Musketeers. When the excesses of France's arrogant King Louis XIV begin to threaten his subjects' very lives, the legendary Musketeers reunite to save their country!

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Taking care of Arnie is mostly Gilbert's task, which can be pretty demanding, at least while you are working at the local grocery store.

programme.title: Real Life, (1979, Comedy)
programme.desc: In his directorial debut. Brooks presents a hilarious account of what happens to a typical American family when a group of filmmakers moves in with them to record "real life."

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Heaven Can Wait is a romantic fantasy about Joe Pendleton, a Los Angeles Rams quarterback who is accidentally summoned to Heaven by an overly zealous celestial escort.

programme.title: Paper Moon, (1973, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryan O'Neal teams up with his daughter, Tatum in this film for which Tatum won an Oscar in her role. Con man Moses Pray, driving through depression-era Kansas with a carload of deluxe bibles and a list of newly widowed prospects for his line.

programme.title: Love Story, (1969, Romance)
programme.desc: The story of a young couple who cross social barriers, marry and ultimately face the greatest crisis of all.

programme.title: Last Of The Red Hot Lovers, (1972, Romance)
programme.desc: A middle-aged restaurant owner heart yearns for one memorable affair. After securing a key to his mother's apartment, he is free to seek an afternoon fling. But he fumbles his way through three beautiful women who have something else on their minds.

programme.title: Wuthering Heights, (1970, Romance)
programme.desc: A passionate adaptation of Emily Bronts superbly strange and hauntingly enduring classic novel, starring Timothy Dalton and Anna Calder-Marshall as the doomed and deathless lovers, Heathcliff and Cathy. Directed by Robert Fuest.

programme.title: Aloha, Bobby And Rose, (1975, Drama)
programme.desc: Bobby and Rose, two youngsters who are in love, have to run away from home when they are falsely accused to have committed a robbery and an assassination.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: The Mechanic, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: In a role that powered him to stardom, Charles Bronson is an underworld executioner who turns murder into an art form in this ultimate crime chiller.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Boa Hancock makes Luffy mad when she turns Margaret into a statue. The Snake Princess may have bitten off more than she can chew by challenging the captain of the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HEARTLESS JUDGMENT! MARGARET IS TURNED TO STONE!!

programme.title: The Snake Princess pits Luffy's Gum-Gum abilities against the incredible Haki power of her serpentine sisters in a fight to the death. Will Luffy survive long enough to save his statuesque friends?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DIFFICULT FIGHT FOR LUFFY! THE SNAKE SISTERS' HAKI POWER!!

programme.title: Luffy kicks his attack mode into Second Gear to save a precious statue, and the snake sisters start to feel the Straw Hat heat. At the battle's climax, Luffy makes an impression on his opponents.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ALL-OUT SPECIAL POWER BATTLE!! GUM-GUM VS. SNAKE-SNAKE

programme.title: News of Luffy's run-in with the Celestial Dragons impresses the Snake Princess, so she tells him the story of her tortured past. Will his honorable nature speed Luffy toward a reunion with his crew?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HANCOCK'S CONFESSION-- THE SISTERS' ABHORRENT PAST

programme.title: Luffy is mobbed by a hoard of pretty Kuja women eager to touch a real live man. Granny Nyon offers him a safe haven, but what she has to say might sink his plans for a Straw Hat reunion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SAVING ACE! THE NEXT STOP: THE GREAT PRISON

programme.title: Boa Hancock's illness threatens to sabotage Luffy's rescue mission. However, the Snake Princess just can't say "no" to the rubber-man, so a plan to save Ace is quickly hatched.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LOVE IS A HURRICANE! LOVE-LOVE HANCOCK

programme.title: While Luffy races to save Ace, Nami tries to survive life on Sky Island, and Franky dances up a snowstorm before making the switch from cola to tea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! THE SCIENCE OF WEATHER AND THE MECHANICAL ISLAND

programme.title: Chopper narrowly avoids being served for dinner in a land inhabited by giant birds, and Sanji's refined tastes land him a role as a leading lady on the island of girlish hearts.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! AN ISLAND OF GIANT BIRDS AND A PINK PARADISE!

programme.title: Nico Robin finds herself trapped on the island of Tequila Wolf: a miserable land where children are forced to work as slaves. Elsewhere, Usopp tries to survive a run-in with a man-eating plant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! BRIDGING THE ISLANDS AND VICIOUS VEGETATION!

programme.title: Zoro is held against his will by the pink-haired princess of bad vibes, Brook gets mistaken for the king of darkness, and Luffy continues to eat his way toward a reunion with Fire-Fist Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! A NEGATIVE PRINCESS AND THE KING OF DEMONS!

programme.title: Luffy and Boa arrive at Impel Down, but only thirty-three hours remain until Ace's execution. To save him, the Snake Princess must find a way to hide Luffy during her full-body search!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DEADLY INFILTRATION! THE UNDERWATER PRISON IMPEL DOWN

programme.title: Time is running out on Ace, so Luffy teams up with a scoundrel who's going to pieces trying to escape Impel Down. There's no love lost between the former foes, but they'd better work together if they want to survive.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A REUNION IN HELL?! THE MAN WHO ATE THE CHOP-CHOP FRUIT!

programme.title: Luffy must part ways with a priceless treasure map before Buggy the Clown agrees to lead him through the bloody tangle of Blade Trees and Spike Needle Grass that make up Impel Down's Crimson Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BREAK THROUGH THE CRIMSON HELL! BUGGY'S CHAOS-INDUCING PLAN

programme.title: Luffy and Buggy the Clown could end up as hippo food if they aren't careful in Impel Down's Wild Beast Hell. Of course, the rubber-man might find that a better fate than dealing with the prison's putrid warden!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRONGEST MAN IN THE PRISON! POISON MAN MAGELLAN APPEARS

programme.title: Luffy and his crew stumble upon a most peculiar village when they hitch a ride on a fire-breathing beetle. The natives are petrified of pirates, but they welcome the Straw Hats with open arms!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / A GOLD LION'S AMBITION ON THE MOVE

programme.title: The citizens of Little East Blue throw in a feast in honor of the Straw Hats, but when the Amigo Pirates try to capture Boss the Beetle, Luffy and his crew will have to defend their new friends.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / LITTLE EAST BLUE IN DANGER

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji prepare to do battle on behalf of Boss the Beetle, but Captain Largo of the Amigo Pirates counters with a deadly arsenal of nets to put the Straw Hat brawlers on lock down!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / THE FIERCE ONSLAUGHT OF THE AMIGO PIRATES

programme.title: Luffy kicks into Second Gear for his rematch with Largo, and Nami leads the islanders as they lay waste to the Amigo Pirates. Boss the Beetle may be safe for now, but someone sinister lurks behind the scenes.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Special Presentation Related to the Movie/ The Battle is on! Luffy Vs. Largo

programme.title: Luffy struggles to stay a step ahead of a prison patrol made up of hungry lions and poisonous scorpions! Meanwhile, Ace spends what could be his final hours swapping stories with a pirate who hates pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Warlord in Prison Jimbei, The Honorable Pirate

programme.title: While the guards struggle to squelch a violent prison uprising, Luffy and his fellow fugitives try to keep their cool in a level of Impel Down known as Starvation Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Trap of Chief Guard Saldeath - Level 3 Starvation Hell

programme.title: Boa Hancock uses her ample assets to buy some private time for a clandestine chat with Ace. Meanwhile, Luffy needs help from a graceful friend to escape the jaws of a hungry Sphinx!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Liberated Swan! Reunion! Bon Kurei

programme.title: Luffy and Bon are on the verge of reaching Level 4, but they didn't count on fighting a demonic, lightning-fast, devastatingly powerful Minotaur! To defeat this beast, they'll need help from a human candle and a deranged clown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chief Warden Magellan Moves - The Net to Trap Straw Hat Is Complete!

programme.title: Luffy narrowly avoids a deadly dip in the boiling pool of blood, only to find himself face to face with Warden Magellan. Meanwhile, outside the prison walls, the marine fleet prepares for Whitebeard's onslaught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Preparations for War! A Decisive Battle in Level 4 - Blazing Hell

programme.title: Warden Magellan is a monster of a man with a penchant for poisoning prisoners. To rescue Ace, Luffy must go toe to toe with this toxic terror, but how do you defeat a foe who's deadly to the touch?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Magellan's Strength! Bon Kurei Flees Before His Enemy

programme.title: Luffy's daring assault on the venomous warden of Impel Down leaves him struggling to stand up, but despite the lethal poison breaking down his body, the rubber-man kicks his rescue mission into Second Gear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SHOWDOWN HAS COME! LUFFY'S DESPERATE LAST ATTACK!

programme.title: While Luffy hovers perilously on the verge of death, Bon Clay embarks on a suicidal rescue mission plagued by sub-zero temperatures and bloodthirsty wolves with a supremely savage disposition!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FOR HIS FRIEND! BON CLAY'S DEADLY RESCUE ATTEMPT

programme.title: No existing antidote can save Luffy from the poison coursing through his veins, yet Bon Clay refuses to give up. His final, fleeting hope is a mysterious miracle-worker rumored to have vanished into the Gates of Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A PARADISE IN HELL / IMPEL DOWN LEVEL 5.5

programme.title: Bon is overjoyed to hear that Luffy is still alive, but his happiness quickly turns to shock when he learns that Ivan's agonizingly painful "Healing Hormones" will cost the rubber-man ten years of his life!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S TREATMENT BEGINS / IVA'S MIRACULOUS POWER!

programme.title: Ace is scheduled to be executed in a matter of hours, and Luffy's still hovering on the verge of death. It will take a miracle to save them both, but Bon would rather die than give up on his friend!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BELIEVE IN MIRACLES! BON CLAY'S CRIES FROM THE HEART

programme.title: Luffy miraculously survived his brush with death, but he's far too weak to finish rescuing Ace. Ivan is reluctant to lend a hormonal hand to the doomed rescue mission until he learns of Luffy's lineage!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY BACK IN ACTION! IVA BEGINS THE BREAKOUT PLAN!!

programme.title: The quest to rescue Ace tuckers out thanks to a blast of sleeping gas! Ivan's scissor-handed sidekick puts an end to nap time, but Luffy will have to join forces with a scar-faced foe from the past if he wants to complete his mission!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ACE'S CONVOY BEGINS / BATTLE ON THE LOWEST FLOOR, LEVEL 6!

programme.title: Luffy's desperate attempt to rescue Ace is bolstered by two powerful new allies: the murderous Crocodile and the honorable fishman Jinbei. Meanwhile, Ivan sparks a prison riot to create a diversion for the rubber-man.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ULTIMATE TEAM IS FORMED / SHAKING IMPEL DOWN!

programme.title: Luffy and his gang of outlaws cause a commotion on Level Four, Blackbeard's arrival leads to the release of the prison's most feared inmate, and Ace gazes upon the great blue sky for what could be the very last time!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVEN MORE CHAOS! BLACKBEARD TEACH INVADES

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: Rollerball, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jonathan Cross (Chris Klein) is an all-American hotshot, the most popular player in the fastest and most extreme sport of all time: Rollerball.

programme.title: Return of Sabata, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: The great Lee Van Cleef ('Death Rides a Horse') returns as the famous freewheeling gunslinger Sabata. In this third and final go-round for the enigmatic sharpshooter, Sabata seeks revenge when a band of desperadoes bilks him out of $5,000.

programme.title: Gunslinger, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: When the town marshal is gunned down, his wife Rose (Beverly Garland) dons his badge. But now an evil dancehall diva (Allison Hayes) wants her dead and hires a gunslinger (John Ireland), who agrees to kill Rose...until he falls in love with her!

programme.title: Last Train From Gun Hill, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: Screen giants Kirk Douglas and Anthony Quinn star in this taut Western thriller directed by acclaimed filmmaker John Sturges (Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, The Great Escape).

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Western)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher whos continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar-winning roles.

programme.title: Valdez Is Coming, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: In this rousing Western, when a greedy rancher causes the death of an innocent man, former sheriff Bob Valdez (Burt Lancaster) orders him to provide financial support for the widow. But when he refuses, Valdez vows to exact justice at any cost!

programme.title: The White Buffalo, (1977, Western)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson and Will Sampson star as Wild Bill Hickok and Chief Crazy Horse in this one-of-a-kind western that finds both western legends braving the snowy wilderness in search of the demon that haunts them both, the fabled White Buffalo!

programme.title: Indian Territory, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Following the Civil War, Cavalry Sergeant Gene Autry is sent to break up a series of Indian raids upon settlers, led by a renegade Austrian, who wishes to use the Indians to build an empire.

programme.title: Mule Train, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: When natural cement is discovered by two prospectors, one is murdered during a claim jump attempt. Marshal Gene Autry befriends the lone prospector and tries to help him promote his cement discovery.

programme.title: The Missouri Breaks, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Marlon Brando and Jack Nicholson ignite the screen in this rousing story of a wealthy Montana rancher who hires a professional killer to track down a gang of horse thieves.

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: Up in the Air, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Ryan (George Clooney) flies all over for work, but after meeting a passenger he learns that life isn't about the journey, but the connections we make along the way.

programme.title: Save The Last Dance, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: Sara is a small-town girl who dreams to become a world-class ballerina. But when her mother suddenly dies, she must abandon her plans and join her estranged father on Chicago's South Side.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: World Trade Center, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage and Michael Pea star as two New York City Port Authority policemen who were trapped in the rubble of September 11, 2001.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako befriends a little girl named Mie who is a huge fan of Sailor Moon. Meanwhile, Ail and An send a Cardian to steal energy from young children.
programme.sub-title: The Targeted Kindergarteners: Venus to the Rescue

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Mamoru find themselves looking after a baby boy while his mother is recovering from having her energy stolen by a Cardian.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A school festival is going to be held at T.A. Girls Academy, which Rei attends. Usagi and Ami go to check up on her.
programme.sub-title: The School Festival Is for Me?! Queen Rei's Song

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami and Makoto are trying to figure out who the Moonlight Knight is. Makoto volunteers to investigate by getting closer to Seijuro.
programme.sub-title: Is Seijuro the Moonlight Knight? Mako on Fire

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls get into an argument over who gets to play Snow White in the upcoming play with Mamoru.
programme.sub-title: Steal a Kiss from Mamoru: An's Project Snow White

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Natsumi both get detention after angering Ms. Haruna during class. The two start working on their assignment when a Cardian shows up.
programme.sub-title: After-School Trouble: Usagi Is a Target

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ail and An learn that the Makai Tree is beginning to die. Usagi and her friends visit Natsumi after hearing that Natsumi is not feeling well.
programme.sub-title: Disconnecting Love: The Raging Makai Tree

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: While visiting Seijuro and Natsumi's apartment, Usagi and Mamoru come under attack by the Makai Tree.
programme.sub-title: True Love Awakens: The Makai Tree's Secret

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A mysterious girl suddenly falls down from the sky. Calling herself 'Usagi,' the girl demands Usagi to tell her where the Silver Crystal is.
programme.sub-title: Angel or Devil? The Mysterious Girl from the Sky

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi wakes up to find that Chibi-Usa has gone missing. Meeting up with Mamoru, the two search for Chibi-Usa, finding her alone at the park.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Devastated: Mamoru Declares a Break-Up

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami is offered a chance to study abroad in Germany. Knowing how important this is to her, Usagi and the others urge Ami to accept the offer.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei's grandfather is upset that Hikawa Shrine has had fewer female visitors lately. He then decides to retire as head priest to start a new business.
programme.sub-title: Women Must Be Strong and Beautiful: Rei's New Special Technique

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rubeus sends down Petz and her Droid to search and capture Chibi-Usa. Chibi-Usa is calling someone telling her she wants to go home.

programme.desc: Um antigo policial que agora trabalha como miliciano investiga um tiroteio que aconteceu em seu bairro. Porm, tudo fica mais complicado quando ele descobre que algum da sua prpria milcia pode ter sido o responsvel.

programme.desc: Quando uma tempestade de inverno atinge a Carolina do Norte com a menor temperatura j registrada na histria, os climatologistas comeam uma corrida contra o tempo para salvar o mximo de vidas possveis antes que o pas inteiro vire gelo.

programme.title: Assassinos de Aluguel
programme.desc: Inspirado na histria real de um escndalo que envolveu presidirios sendo liberados por um dia para trabalharem como assassinos de aluguel para polticos corruptos.

programme.title: Ataque Colina 400
programme.desc: Em 1944, durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, o 2 Batalho do exrcito americano recebe a misso de cercar a cidade alem de Bergstein e a Colina 400, um local altamente estratgico.

programme.title: Desejos Ocultos - S1E0
programme.desc: Sophie e James compram um rob ultrarrealista para cuidar de sua nova casa. Com o tempo, o androide Henry passa a demonstrar curiosidade pelas emoes humanas, jogando os trs em uma mistura de medo, dvidas e desejo.

programme.title: A Disputa - S1E0
programme.desc: Para comemorar o aniversrio de Hitler, os nazistas organizam uma partida de futebol entre um time de elite e um esquadro de presos. Apesar dos obstculos que enfrentam, a equipe dos prisioneiros est determinada a vencer, acontea o que acontecer.

programme.title: O Lutador de Auschwitz - S1E0
programme.desc: Um olhar sobre a vida do campeo de boxe Tadeusz Teddy Pietrzykowski, que em 1940 chega no primeiro transporte de prisioneiros ao recm-criado campo de concentrao de Auschwitz.

programme.title: A Espi - S1E0
programme.desc: Em 1941, durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, Sonja Wigert alistada pelo servio de segurana sueco com a misso de se infiltrar aos nazistas em Oslo.

programme.title: Guerra sob a Terra - S1E0
programme.desc: Durante a Primeira Guerra Mundial, o coronel Hellfire Jack traa um plano ousado. Ele recruta um grupo de mineiros locais para cavar um tnel, das trincheiras aliadas s trincheiras alems, na esperana de detonar bombas sob o inimigo e ter vantagem.

programme.title: Kompromat - O Dossi Russo - S1E0
programme.desc: Um diplomata francs enviado para a Sibria, mas logo percebe que est envolvido em uma emboscada do Servio de Segurana da Rssia. Agora ele no possui outra sada seno tentar escapar.

programme.title: O Jovem Viking - S1E0
programme.desc: Halvdan no o tipo perfeito de viking, pois manca e considerado pelas outras crianas um estranho solitrio e sem amigos. Um dia, durante suas excurses solitrias ao rio, ele encontra Meia, a filha corajosa do rei.

programme.title: Meu Querido Elfo - S1E0
programme.desc: Uma me solteira compra um apartamento antigo, sem saber que uma criatura mtica, um elfo, vive no apartamento h sculos. Os novos donos da casa precisam fazer amizade com a criatura, cuja tarefa justamente proteger o local de uma bruxa.

programme.title: Confisses de um Filho - S1E0
programme.desc: Sean se rebela e sai da casa de sua famlia, para descobrir a vida por conta prpria. Dois anos mais tarde, enquanto ainda tenta encontrar respostas sobre sua vida, Sean confrontado pelo professor, que o desafia a rever sua vida como uma histria.

programme.title: Jungle - Protegendo a Selva - S1E0
programme.desc: Dipankar Nair gerencia santurio de elefantes ameaado por caadores de marfim. Seu filho Raj, veterinrio de Mumbai, visita o local no aniversrio da morte da me e se aproxima dos elefantes Bhola e Didi.

programme.title: Submisso - S1E0
programme.desc: Dois fuzileiros voltam para casa depois de passarem por inmeros traumas no confronto com Estado Islmico. Eles buscam um novo caminho e, enquanto um tenta se recuperar de um vcio, o outro reencontra o MMA.
